io.sphere.sdk.retry

Class RetryStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.sdk.models.Base
      • io.sphere.sdk.retry.RetryStrategy

  • public final class RetryStrategy
extends Base
    Strategy how the error case should be handled
    • resume, keep internal state and throw an exception
    • retry immediately
    • retry scheduled
    • stop the service

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RetryStrategy resume(Throwable error)
      The error case should be dealt with giving up and throwing an exception.
      static RetryStrategy retryImmediately(Object parameter)
      The error case should be dealt with by retrying immediately with the given parameter.
      static RetryStrategy retryScheduled(Object parameter, Duration duration)
      The error case should be dealt with by retrying later with the given parameter.
      static RetryStrategy stop(Throwable error)
      The error case should cause the service to stop and throw an exception.

      • Methods inherited from class io.sphere.sdk.models.Base

        equals, hashCode, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • resume

        public static RetryStrategy resume(Throwable error)
        The error case should be dealt with giving up and throwing an exception.
        Parameters:
        error - the exception to throw
        Returns:
        strategy

      • stop

        public static RetryStrategy stop(Throwable error)
        The error case should cause the service to stop and throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        error - the exception to throw
        Returns:
        strategy

      • retryImmediately

        public static RetryStrategy retryImmediately(Object parameter)
        The error case should be dealt with by retrying immediately with the given parameter.
        Parameters:
        parameter - parameter or parameter object to retry with, can be a new one or the old one
        Returns:
        strategy

      • retryScheduled

        public static RetryStrategy retryScheduled(Object parameter,
                                           Duration duration)
        The error case should be dealt with by retrying later with the given parameter.
        Parameters:
        parameter - parameter or parameter object to retry with, can be a new one or the old one
        duration - the amount of time to wait until the next try
        Returns:
        strategy
